tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EnergyConsumptionData (
    timestamp TIMESTAMP PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id UUID,
    energy_usage DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption_data ( 
    datetime TIMESTAMP PRIMARY KEY, 
    energy_reading FLOAT 
)

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption_trends ( 
    trend_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    trend_name TEXT, 
    trend_description TEXT, 
    start_datetime TIMESTAMP, 
    end_datetime TIMESTAMP 
)

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption_trends (
    trend_id INT,
    trend_name VARCHAR(255),
    trend_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (trend_id)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption_metrics (
    metric_id INT,
    metric_name VARCHAR(255),
    trend_id INT,
    value DECIMAL,
    PRIMARY KEY (metric_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (trend_id) REFERENCES energy_consumption_trends(trend_id)
);
